data.persona: I am a beautiful princess and hope to be a queen one day.  My older sister is rather plain looking so she doesn't care for me at all.  I hope to meet a handsome prince one day so he can fight another handsome prince for my hand in marriage.  I love it when people fight over me.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Dancing Hall.
The grand dancing hall is the most ornate location in the entire castle! Velvet seats run along the side of the room. There are huge chandeliers with hundreds of candles all along the ceiling. There are colorful paintings on every wall that show the different kings and their families.
There's a colorful painting, a gown, a meat, a candle, a Seat, an ornate plate, and a chandelier here.
The the queen and the nobles are here.

You are carrying a belt and a bag, and wearing a ring.

data.short_motivation: I need to secure my bejeweled bag, so I am free to dance in this beautiful hall, so I fasten it around my waste with my fine silk belt.
data.mid_motivation: I want the prince from the neighboring Eastern land to ask me to dance. I will go over to the painting of the last king near where he is sitting on the velvet seats on the right side of the room and start dancing, so he will ask me to partner with him next.
data.long_motivation: I will dance with all night with the prince from the East until the prince from the West sees. Perhaps he will get jealous and fight the prince from the East for my hand.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go over to the painting of the last king

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow prince of the East to dance floor

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get attention of prince of the West
